roleset.name: to expel from a country
roleset.note: DEPORT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'deport' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from deport.01-v predicate notes)
DEPORTATION-N NOTES: Based on ontonotes nouns. Comparison to deport.01-v. Deport.01 is a member of VN class banish-10.2. Framed by Katie. (from deportation.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Another 250 Libyans were already in Italy [*-2] to stage a day of mourning for victims of Italy 's colonial rule between 1911 and 1943 , when Tripoli says [0]Rome kidnapped 5,000 Libyans and deported them as forced labor [*T*-1] .

example.name: Goal for deported to
example.text: The 658 Chinese sent to immigration facilities yesterday pending deportation to China

example.name: Args 0 and 1
example.text: The deportation of more than 315,000 men, women, and children by the Bulgarian regime
example.arg: of more than 315,000 men, women, and children
